title: Cleaver
content:
Cleaver Common 1~6 Damage 1d6 Slashing Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Stained with blood and gore, the handle has almost rusted through. Handaxe Light Thrown 0.9 16

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

Stained with blood and gore, the handle has almost rusted through.

Handaxe Light Thrown

Cleaver is one of the Simple Melee Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc). Characters
